definition: between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: In diplomatic language, the phrase is normally taken to mean spying.
sentences.chinese: 在外交語言上，這句話的意思通常是指間諜活動。

sentences.english: They were forced to suspend their espionage activities after their identities were compromised.
sentences.chinese: 在身份泄露後，他們被迫擱置了自己的間諜活動。

sentences.english: It engages in espionage and terrorism with Isreal.
sentences.chinese: 它從事對以色列的間諜活動和恐怖主義。
更具體地說，網絡間諜活動。

sentences.english: Every counter intelligence faces such happening all around the globe.
sentences.chinese: 全球反情報人員都要面對間諜活動。

sentences.english: But espionage is only one worry.
sentences.chinese: 不過，間諜活動還只是憂慮之一。

sentences.english: Neither was there any hint of espionage in Hanley's early life.
sentences.chinese: 漢利的早期生活也毫無進行間諜活動的跡象。

sentences.english: But spying left plenty of time to sample the local cuisine.
sentences.chinese: 但間諜活動卻讓他有大量的時間來研究地方菜。

sentences.english: The basis of spycraft is breaking the rules without being noticed.
sentences.chinese: 間諜活動的基要就是在對方渾然不覺時打破規則。

sentences.english: The trade name for this type of spying is the "honey trap."
sentences.chinese: 這類間諜活動美其名曰“美人計”。

sentences.english: Before they could carry out acts of sabotage or espionage they were apprehended.
sentences.chinese: 他們尚未從事破壞活動或間諜活動即被逮捕。

sentences.english: He was accused of spying and declared non grata.
sentences.chinese: 他被控從事間諜活動而被宣佈爲不受歡迎。

sentences.english: This type of industrial espionage is prevalent in the defense-related industries.
sentences.chinese: 這種類型的工業間諜活動在國防工業內十分普遍。

sentences.english: Perfect Dark Zero plunges players into a world of corporate espionage and conspiracy.
sentences.chinese: 完美黑暗零陷入了企業間諜活動和陰謀的世界球員。

definition: loss (of sth through natural disaster, theft etc) (law)
abbr. for 國家安全局|国家安全局[Guo2 jia1 An1 quan2 ju2]

pinyin: Shi4 jie4 Wei4 sheng1 Da4 hui4

definition: Edward Snowden (1983-), American surveillance program whistleblower
to stipulate/to state expressly/to explicitly provide for
